EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_CF Summit Customer Event_Santa Clara_Q217.Confirmation - no button
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering for the Pivotal & VMWare CF Summit Cocktail Reception!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal and VMware CF Summit Cocktail Reception <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/CF-Summit-Cocktail-Reception-SantaClara.html]]> in the Great America Ballroom at the Santa Clara Convention Center.
Date:
Tuesday, June 13, 2017
Time:
7:30PM to 9:30PM
Location:
Santa Clara Convention Center 5001 Great America Pkwy Santa Clara, CA, 95054 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Santa+Clara+Convention+Center/@37.4046706,-121.9752469,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0xc1ebf7e60770d2e4?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwiRt7n9zuXTAhUi44MKHe0DB64Q_BIIeTAM]]>) Great America Ballroom | 2nd Floor
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us at fieldevents@pivotal.io <[[mailto:fieldevents@pivotal.io]]>. We look forward to seeing you there!
